mapper.select: SELECT FUNCTION_PK, FUNCTION_NAME, FUNCTION_URL,FUNCTION_ICON,FUNCTION_SORT FROM SC_FUNCTION WHERE FUNCTION_PK IN ( SELECT FK_FUNCTION FROM sc_shop_role_function WHERE FK_SHOP = #{SHOP_ID} AND FK_ROLE = ( SELECT FK_ROLE FROM sc_user_shop WHERE FK_USER = #{USER_ID} AND FK_SHOP = #{SHOP_ID})) AND FUNCTION_SWITCH='on' ORDER BY CONVERT(FUNCTION_SORT, SIGNED);
mapper.insert: insert into sc_shop_role_function SELECT #{UUID}, #{FK_SHOP}, #{FK_ROLE}, FUNCTION_PK, NOW() FROM sc_function where FUNCTION_SWITCH = 'on' ORDER BY CONVERT(FUNCTION_SORT, SIGNED)
